mapper.sql: oid, stu_id, name, level, obtain_date,unit_name, rank, status
mapper.select:
select count(*) from t_contest as tc where 1=1
AND tc.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{name}),'%')

select tc.* from t_contest as tc where 1=1
AND tc.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{name}),'%')
order by tc.oid desc
limit #{start},#{length}

select count(*) from t_contest as tc left join t_student stu on tc.stu_id = stu.id where 1=1
AND tc.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{searchDTO.name}),'%')
AND tc.level = #{searchDTO.level}
AND stu.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{searchDTO.stuName}),'%')
mapper.insert:
insert into t_contest
stu_id,
name,
level,
obtain_date,
unit_name,
rank,
status,
stu_id = #{stuId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER},
obtain_date = #{obtainDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
unit_name = #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rank = #{rank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update: update t_contest set stu_id = #{stuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, obtain_date = #{obtainDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, unit_name = #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rank = #{rank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where oid = #{oid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_contest
stu_id = #{stuId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER},
obtain_date = #{obtainDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
unit_name = #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rank = #{rank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where oid = #{oid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
